metadata.title: CVE-2020-12755 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: fishProtocol::establishConnection in fish/fish.cpp in KDE kio-extrasthrough 20.04.0 makes a cacheAuthentication call even if the user had notset the keepPassword option. This may lead to unintended KWallet storage ofa password.

criterions.comment: kio-extras: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
